labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The "Well, this is awkward Looks like Discord has crashed unexpectedly...." message pops up and gives you the option to reload. After reloading i can't even enter the emoji tab, the crash message pops up immediately.
data.expected_result: Upload an emoji as usual or edit existing ones
data.short_description: Can't enter the emoji tab or upload an emoji while using Greek as Discord's language
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings and change the language to Greek - Go to server settings and click the Emoji menu/tab - Try uploading an Emoji
